content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite comfortable and convenient. How much are you willing to pay for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I'm looking for a place that is not only comfortable but also within my budget. I'd like to discuss the price with you to find a fair agreement. Would you be willing to start at a lower rate?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Of course, Maryam. I'm open to negotiations. How much do you think is a fair price for this apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I believe a fair price would be around 800 Euros per month, considering the location and the amenities. Would you be able to meet this price?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but 800 Euros is quite low for an apartment of this quality in the city center. I'm looking for a price closer to 1000 Euros per month. What do you think of that?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 1000 Euros per month is quite high for a newly built unfurnished one-bedroom apartment, even in the city center. I'm sure we can find a middle ground that is more reasonable. How about 900 Euros? This would be a good balance between your asking price and my budget.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hmm, 900 Euros is still lower than what I'm looking for. I'm willing to negotiate, but I need to cover my costs and make a profit. How about we meet in the middle at 950 Euros? This way, both parties are satisfied.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mr. Schmidt. 950 Euros is more acceptable, but I would appreciate if we could go a little lower. How about 925 Euros? This would be a fair compromise for both of us.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, I appreciate your effort to reach a middle ground. However, 925 Euros is still not enough for me to cover my expenses. Let's make one final offer: If you agree to pay 935 Euros per month, I will include all utilities in the price. This way, you don't have to worry about additional costs. What do you say?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a very generous offer, Mr. Schmidt. Including the utilities in the price makes the 935 Euros more attractive. I appreciate your willingness to work with me. I agree to the price of 935 Euros! TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
